requirement.original: Convert Amadeus Flight Search MCP to Claude skill for flight booking
requirement.clarified: Create a Claude skill that wraps Amadeus Flight Search MCP and configure it for transportation agent. The skill should handle flight search with real-time pricing, multi-city itineraries, and airline details.
requirement.what: Create Amadeus skill using progressive disclosure pattern and integrate with transportation agent
requirement.why: Enable comprehensive flight search with GDS-level data, price trends, and multi-city routing capabilities

included: Create amadeus-flight skill file with progressive disclosure pattern
Implement flight search and pricing tools
Set up secure credential management pattern

success_criteria: Amadeus Flight skill file exists in .claude/commands/
Transportation agent configured to use amadeus-flight skill
Credential management follows security best practices
constraints: Must integrate without breaking current functionality

root_cause_analysis.symptom: Transportation agent lacks international flight data
root_cause_analysis.root_cause: No integration with flight search APIs for international routes

development_approach.strategy: Create skill using progressive disclosure pattern. Configure transportation agent to invoke skill for international flights.

mcp_info.name: Amadeus Flight Search MCP
tools: price_analysis - Get price trends and predictions
seat_availability - Check seat and cabin availability
